description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the area

Effect Each creature within 30 feet becomes wrapped in heavy spectral chains forged from its own sins and regrets. Each must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape]{Escapes} (DC 25).

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature is overwhelmed with guilt, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 1 day.

stealth.details: (expert) to sense an oppressive aura of sorrow

details.description: Influenced by the guilt and regrets of the dead, creatures are wrapped in weighted chains that embody their own sins.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:26|name:Disrupt the haunt] (expert) to disrupt the haunt through prayer or @Check[type:deception|dc:27|name:Openly defy your regrets] (expert) to openly defy your regrets and banish the haunt. Creatures who haven't committed sins or already made amends for their transgressions are immune to the effects of this haunt.
